title: Crayon Art
description: Un style d'illustration charmant de livre pour enfants caractérisé par des textures lourdes ressemblant au crayon de couleur, au pastel gras et à la gouache sèche sur papier rugueux. Il présente des proportions naïves et ludiques, une palette terreuse et chaleureuse, et une finition tactile faite à la main où le grain du papier est visiblement intégré dans l'ombrage.
prompt: A delightful, highly textured children's book illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a whimsical mixed-media style combining colored pencils, wax crayons, and dry gouache. The artwork simulates a rough, tactile surface, perhaps heavy watercolor paper or cardstock, where the grain creates natural noise and white speckles within the color blocks. The {{subject}} is depicted with charming, slightly exaggerated proportions—round shapes, expressive features, and a naive, folk-art influence. The color palette is dominated by warm, comforting shades of {{primary_color}}, with scratchy, hand-drawn details and patterns in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is flat and ambient, typical of 2D illustration, relying on texture density rather than realistic shadows to create depth. Lines are imperfect and scratchy, suggesting a quick, creative hand. The composition feels cozy and intimate, evoking a sense of innocent storytelling and indie artistic flair. Reinforcement tags: textured digital painting, analog aesthetic, dry brush, scuff marks, pastel texture, matte finish, cozy atmosphere, playful character design, indie picture book, flat perspective, granular shading, vibrant yet earthy, 4k, high resolution, tactile rendering.
background_prompt: A cozy, cluttered interior wall or backdrop filled with an eclectic arrangement of framed sketches, art prints, and doodles in a naive style. Interspersed are stylized potted plants with scratchy leaf textures. The scene is rendered in {{primary_color}} tones with {{accent_color}} details, featuring heavy paper grain, dry crayon textures, and a flat, illustrative perspective suitable for a children's book setting. No central subject, only the textured environment.
description_en: A charming children's book illustration style characterized by heavy textures resembling colored pencil, wax crayon, and dry gouache on rough paper. It features naive, playful proportions, a warm earthy palette, and a tactile, hand-drawn finish where the paper grain is visibly integrated into the shading.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration charmant de livre pour enfants caractérisé par des textures lourdes ressemblant au crayon de couleur, au pastel gras et à la gouache sèche sur papier rugueux. Il présente des proportions naïves et ludiques, une palette terreuse et chaleureuse, et une finition tactile faite à la main où le grain du papier est visiblement intégré dans l'ombrage.
prompt_removebg: A delightful, highly textured children's book illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a mixed-media style resembling dry gouache, wax crayons, and colored pencils applied to rough grain paper. The artistic rendering is whimsical and naive, featuring playful proportions, expressive features, and simplified geometric forms typical of mid-century storybook art. The surface texture is the defining characteristic: visible dry brushstrokes, scuffed wax resist effects, grainy noise, and scratchy pencil lines that create a tactile, handmade feel. The color palette is vibrant but slightly desaturated, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant hue for the main subject, with energetic details and patterns in {{accent_color}}. Lighting is flat and illustrative, avoiding realistic volumetric rendering in favor of texture density and cross-hatching to suggest depth. The subject is isolated and composited against a clean {{background_color}} background, ensuring the rough, organic edges of the drawing are clearly defined against the {{background_color}} surface. The mood is cozy, creative, and nostalgic, evoking the feeling of a beloved classic picture book. No photorealism, heavy paper grain, matte finish.
background_prompt_removebg: A cozy, cluttered creative environment serving as a background, featuring a wall adorned with loose sketches, color swatches, and art prints in a hand-drawn style. Potted plants with textured leaves frame the scene, introducing organic shapes. The rendering style mimics dry gouache and crayon with scratchy textures, utilizing a palette of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} accents. The scene is set against a flat {{background_color}} wall surface, maintaining a 2D illustrative depth without a central subject.

title: Doodle Pop
description: Un style d'illustration ludique et dessiné à la main, caractérisé par des contours noirs audacieux et imparfaits ainsi qu'une palette de couleurs limitée. Il entoure le sujet d'éléments graphiques énergiques tels que des gribouillis, des formes géométriques et des lignes de mouvement sur un fond blanc cassé chaleureux.
prompt: A charming, hand-drawn vector illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in a whimsical 'doodle art' aesthetic. The artwork features bold, expressive black ink outlines that are slightly rough and organic, imitating the look of a thick felt-tip marker on paper. The composition is energetic, with the main subject surrounded by a dynamic explosion of abstract graphic elements including floating squiggles, dots, exclamation marks, stylized flowers, striped geometric shapes, and motion lines to indicate action or thought. The color palette is minimalist and high-contrast, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant fill color and {{accent_color}} as a vibrant highlight, set against a solid, warm off-white or cream background that mimics smooth sketchbook paper. Shading is minimal or non-existent, relying instead on heavy linework, diagonal hatching, and bold patterns to create visual interest. The style is flat, 2D, and cheerful, capturing the essence of a creative brainstorming session or a modern UI spot illustration. Reinforce with: thick lines, clean vector style, flat design, unshaded, playful atmosphere, creative sketch, editorial illustration, high contrast, crisp details, graphic design elements.
background_prompt: A creative, abstract background pattern featuring a chaotic but pleasing arrangement of hand-drawn doodle elements on a warm cream paper texture. The scene includes scattered squiggles, bold black ink outlines, stylized geometric shapes with diagonal stripes, floating dots, and simple organic forms. Use {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to fill specific graphic elements. The composition acts as a dynamic frame or wallpaper, completely void of characters, focusing entirely on the whimsical marker-style textures and energetic graphic design motifs.
description_en: A playful, hand-drawn illustration style characterized by bold, imperfect black outlines and a limited color palette. It surrounds the subject with energetic graphic elements like squiggles, geometric shapes, and motion lines on a warm, off-white background.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration ludique et dessiné à la main, caractérisé par des contours noirs audacieux et imparfaits ainsi qu'une palette de couleurs limitée. Il entoure le sujet d'éléments graphiques énergiques tels que des gribouillis, des formes géométriques et des lignes de mouvement sur un fond blanc cassé chaleureux.
prompt_removebg: A high-quality, hand-drawn vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a whimsical and energetic doodle art style. The artwork is defined by bold, confident black ink outlines with varying line weights that mimic the texture of a felt-tip marker or brush pen. The coloring is strictly flat and 2D, completely avoiding gradients or photorealism in favor of solid, vibrant blocks of {{primary_color}} as the dominant fill and distinct pops of {{accent_color}} for highlights and details. The {{subject}} serves as the central focal point, playfully surrounded by a dynamic explosion of creative ephemera and 'doodle bombs': floating abstract shapes, heavy black-and-white striped geometric blocks, stylized leafy plants, squiggly motion lines, stippled dots, asterisks, and playful handwritten typography elements like empty speech bubbles or exclamation marks. Shadows are minimal, represented by solid black hatching or heavy drop shadows to create a sticker-like depth. The composition feels spontaneous, organic, and brainstorming-oriented. The entire scene is composited on a clean, flat {{background_color}} background, ensuring crisp edges and high contrast for the illustration. The aesthetic is modern, cheerful, and evocative of tech-startup illustrations or creative journaling. Reinforcement tags: 2D flat design, thick line art, marker aesthetic, creative sketching, corporate memphis influence, kinetic energy, clean vector lines, high contrast, whimsical, sharp focus, 4k resolution, trending on Behance.
background_prompt_removebg: A dynamic and decorative background pattern consisting of scattered hand-drawn doodles and abstract shapes set against a solid {{background_color}} surface. The design features a chaotic but aesthetic arrangement of bold black ink elements including striped triangles, stylized organic leaves, squiggly lines, dots, asterisks, and empty speech bubbles. Flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} are interspersed among the black outlines to add vibrancy. The style mimics a sketchbook page or a creative brainstorming board, with no central subject, serving as a playful and energetic texture.

title: Editorial Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et plat, caractérisé par des formes géométriques épurées, des couleurs vives unies et des formes simplifiées. Il utilise des ombrages aux bords nets et des arrière-plans audacieux, rappelant l'art éditorial technologique contemporain et l'image de marque d'entreprise haut de gamme.
prompt: A sophisticated flat vector illustration of {{subject}} designed in a modern editorial style. The artwork features clean, sharp lines and simplified geometric shapes to construct the form, avoiding realistic textures in favor of smooth, matte surfaces. The rendering is strictly 2D with lineless definitions between shapes, mimicking the aesthetic of high-end digital vector graphics created in Adobe Illustrator. The subject is stylized with playful proportions, smooth curves, and sharp angles, stripping away unnecessary detail for a minimalist look. Use a vibrant color palette where {{primary_color}} dominates the solid, untextured background and major compositional elements, while {{accent_color}} provides bold, graphic contrast in specific details, patterns, or accessories. Shadows are rendered as hard-edged, solid shapes of a slightly darker tone than the base color, creating a crisp, paper-cutout effect without gradients, blurring, or ambient occlusion. The lighting is uniform and flat, enhancing the graphic design feel. The overall atmosphere is professional, optimistic, and trendy. reinforcement tags: flat design, vector art, corporate memphis, behance, dribbble, minimalist, sharp edges, 4k, high contrast, vibrant colors, commercial illustration, digital art, smooth finish, geometric abstraction, joyful, trendy, no outlines, solid colors.
description_en: A modern flat vector illustration style characterized by clean geometric shapes, vibrant solid colors, and simplified forms. It uses hard-edged shading and bold backgrounds, reminiscent of contemporary tech editorial art and high-end corporate branding.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne et plat, caractérisé par des formes géométriques épurées, des couleurs vives unies et des formes simplifiées. Il utilise des ombrages aux bords nets et des arrière-plans audacieux, rappelant l'art éditorial technologique contemporain et l'image de marque d'entreprise haut de gamme.
background_prompt: A minimalist flat vector background consisting of a solid, matte field of {{primary_color}}. Overlay simple, abstract geometric shapes like circles, triangles, and squares in {{accent_color}} and white, floating decoratively around the edges. The style is strictly 2D, clean, and untextured, creating a modern graphic design poster feel with no depth of field or gradients.
prompt_removebg: A high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a trendy, modern corporate art style. The visual language relies on simplified geometric forms and clean curves, completely devoid of black outlines or strokes. The image is constructed using solid, untextured blocks of color, resembling a professional Adobe Illustrator vector export. The color palette is bold and contemporary, dominated by {{primary_color}} for the main clothing or structural elements, with energetic pops of {{accent_color}} used for accessories, highlights, or patterns. Shading is minimal and strictly hard-edged (cel-shaded), creating depth through shape overlapping rather than gradients or soft shadows. The anatomy and features are stylized and approachable, with a focus on distinct silhouettes. The composition is crisp and centered, set against a solid, flat {{background_color}} background to ensure high contrast and easy subject isolation. The overall atmosphere is cheerful, professional, and polished, evoking the aesthetic of high-end tech startup branding or modern editorial illustrations. Reinforce the 2D aesthetic with sharp focus and zero noise.
background_prompt_removebg: A decorative, abstract background pattern in a flat vector style. The scene consists of floating geometric shapes, distinct blobs, and angular forms arranged in a balanced, Memphis-inspired composition. Use a palette of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} for the graphic elements to create a playful yet organized rhythm. The design is completely flat with no depth of field, gradients, or textures, set on a clean {{background_color}} surface to act as a modern graphical backdrop.

title: Matte Clay
description: Ce style présente une esthétique de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisée par des textures lisses et mates qui ressemblent à du plastique souple ou à de la pâte à modeler. Il utilise un éclairage global doux et diffus ainsi que des palettes de couleurs pastel pour créer une apparence propre et ludique, typique des icônes d'interface utilisateur haut de gamme et du motion design moderne.
prompt: A pristine, high-end 3D rendering of {{subject}} designed in a minimalist 'Matte Clay' or claymorphism aesthetic. The subject is stylized with simplified geometry, featuring rounded edges, soft bevels, and a charming, toy-like proportion. The material texture is paramount: it must appear incredibly smooth, non-reflective, and velvety, resembling high-quality soft-touch silicone, matte plastic, or refined modeling clay. The color palette focuses on a dominant, soothing shade of {{primary_color}}, complemented by subtle details in {{accent_color}} to create visual interest without overwhelming the simplicity. The lighting is engineered for softness: utilize a high-key studio setup with broad softboxes and global illumination (GI) to banish all harsh shadows. Shadows should be limited to gentle ambient occlusion and soft contact shadows that ground the object. There is no gloss, specular highlights, or metallic reflection; the finish is purely satin and matte. The image should evoke a sense of playfulness and modern design elegance. Reinforcement tags: 3d icon, isometric view, cinema 4d, blender cycles, octane render, cute, clean lines, solid background, subsurface scattering, ambient occlusion, low poly look, smooth curves, pastel tones, ui design, 4k, ultra-detailed, photorealistic materials, soft lighting.
background_prompt: A clean, seamless studio backdrop rendered in a soft, matte 3D style. The background consists of a solid pastel surface derived from {{primary_color}} or a neutral cream tone, featuring a smooth, curved infinite cyclorama. Floating in the periphery are abstract, geometric primitives like spheres, rounded cubes, or pills in {{accent_color}} with a soft clay texture, positioned to create a decorative frame or depth of field effect without cluttering the center. The lighting is uniform and diffuse, creating a calm, empty space ready for a subject.
description_en: This style features a minimalist 3D rendering aesthetic characterized by smooth, matte textures that resemble soft plastic or modeling clay. It utilizes soft, diffuse global illumination and pastel color palettes to create a clean, toy-like appearance typical of high-end UI icons and modern motion graphics.
description_fr: Ce style présente une esthétique de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisée par des textures lisses et mates qui ressemblent à du plastique souple ou à de la pâte à modeler. Il utilise un éclairage global doux et diffus ainsi que des palettes de couleurs pastel pour créer une apparence propre et ludique, typique des icônes d'interface utilisateur haut de gamme et du motion design moderne.
prompt_removebg: A high-fidelity 3D rendering of {{subject}} designed with a minimalist, soft-touch aesthetic, resembling high-quality matte clay or smooth velvety plastic. The object features rounded edges, gentle curves, and a tactile finish, devoid of sharp angles or noise. The color palette is dominated by soft {{primary_color}} tones with subtle {{accent_color}} highlights, creating a soothing pastel atmosphere. Lighting is uniformly diffuse, simulating a softbox studio setup with global illumination that casts very soft, blurred contact shadows (ambient occlusion), avoiding any harsh blacks or overexposed highlights. The rendering style mimics a clean Cinema 4D or Blender Octane render with high sub-surface scattering for a slightly translucent, milky look where appropriate. The composition is centered and balanced, set against a seamless, solid {{background_color}} background that complements the pastel tones. The image evokes a sense of calm, cleanliness, and playful simplicity, typical of modern icon design or toy aesthetics. 3D illustration, cute, isometric view, claymorphism, matte finish, pastel colors, soft lighting, 8k resolution, smooth geometry, minimal design, photorealistic materials, studio photography, volumetric light, ultra detailed.
background_prompt_removebg: A clean, minimalist 3D studio environment featuring soft, abstract geometric shapes and smooth curves rendered in matte clay textures. The scene uses a palette of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} with gentle gradients. The lighting is diffuse and shadowless, set against a {{background_color}} backdrop, creating a calm and modern aesthetic with subtle depth of field effects.

title: Line Sketch
description: Une illustration de style vectoriel moderne présentant des contours à l'encre lâches et dessinés à la main, remplis de blocs de couleurs unies. Cette esthétique minimaliste repose sur l'espace négatif et des palettes limitées, typiques des storyboards architecturaux et de l'image de marque des entreprises SaaS.
prompt: A professional digital vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a clean, corporate sketch aesthetic. The artwork is defined by fluid, hand-drawn black ink outlines that are confident and slightly organic, mimicking the look of a high-quality marker drawing or architectural concept sketch. The coloring strategy is strictly flat, utilizing solid, unshaded blocks of {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone and {{accent_color}} for strategic highlights, all set against a stark, pure white background. Avoid any gradients, realistic textures, or 3D rendering effects; the style relies entirely on the high contrast between the crisp black linework and the bold color fills. Use negative space intelligently, often leaving skin tones or neutral surfaces as uncolored white space to maintain a minimalist feel. The character proportions should be semi-realistic but simplified for clarity, evoking a sense of modern business efficiency and collaboration. The lighting is flat and implied only through color placement, with no cast shadows or ambient occlusion. Reinforcement tags: vector illustration, hand-drawn lines, flat design, corporate art, minimalist, 2D, architectural storyboard, ink outline, clean lines, business editorial, high contrast, sharp focus, digital marker, isolated on white.
background_prompt: A minimalist environmental backdrop consisting of loose, sketchy architectural lines and abstract geometric forms. The scene suggests a vague office structure or blueprint schematic drawn with thin black ink strokes. Sparse, flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} highlight specific geometric shapes or structural elements, while the majority of the canvas remains pure white negative space to ensure a clean, uncluttered professional appearance.
description_en: A modern vector-style illustration featuring loose, hand-drawn ink outlines filled with flat blocks of solid color. This minimalist aesthetic relies on negative space and limited palettes, typical of architectural storyboards and SaaS business branding.
description_fr: Une illustration de style vectoriel moderne présentant des contours à l'encre lâches et dessinés à la main, remplis de blocs de couleurs unies. Cette esthétique minimaliste repose sur l'espace négatif et des palettes limitées, typiques des storyboards architecturaux et de l'image de marque des entreprises SaaS.
prompt_removebg: A professional, high-definition flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a clean, modern corporate line art style. The artwork is defined by crisp, uniform black outlines that resemble high-quality ink drawings digitally vectorized. The coloring technique is strictly flat, utilizing solid blocks of color with absolutely no gradients, no shading, no texture, and no volumetric lighting effects to maintain a purely 2D aesthetic. The palette is controlled and cohesive, using {{primary_color}} as the dominant fill for main elements and clothing, while {{accent_color}} is applied to specific details to create visual interest and hierarchy. Characters or organic forms feature simplified anatomy with stylized facial features (dots for eyes, simple lines for expressions), evoking a friendly and universal appeal typical of tech startup branding or instructional manuals. The composition is uncluttered and direct, set against a {{background_color}} background to ensure high contrast and perfect edge definition for easy extraction. The lines are smooth and continuous, avoiding any sketchiness or roughness. 2D vector, Adobe Illustrator style, sharp edges, high definition, infographic aesthetic, business illustration, clear communication, flat design, minimalist, bold lines, solid fill, vector art, svg style, clean composition, no noise, no blur, high contrast.
background_prompt_removebg: A minimalist abstract environment featuring clean geometric shapes, subtle layout grids, and decorative fluid blobs rendered in a flat vector style. The composition uses elements colored in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} arranged in a balanced, corporate pattern without any shading or depth. Thin black lines may connect floating elements. The design is strictly 2D and composited on a {{background_color}} canvas, serving as a professional backdrop or decorative frame.

title: Textured Spotlight
description: Un style d'illustration numérique texturé et chaleureux imitant les pastels à la craie et l'impression risographique avec un aspect granuleux fait main. Il se distingue par un cône de lumière net et dramatique qui crée un fort contraste entre le centre lumineux et les zones environnantes plus sombres.
prompt: A charming, textured digital editorial illustration of {{subject}}, rendered in the style of hand-drawn chalk pastels mixed with risograph printing aesthetics. The visual texture is heavy and grainy, resembling rough paper or noise, giving the image a tactile, analog feel. The composition is flat and graphic, utilizing a naive perspective with slightly rough, organic edges rather than sharp vector lines. A defining feature is the lighting: a dramatic, hard-edged conical spotlight shines down across the scene, creating a sharp division between the illuminated area (which is bright and slightly washed out) and the surrounding shadowed area (which is richer and darker in tone). The color palette is dominated by muted {{primary_color}} hues in the background and shadows, with pops of {{accent_color}} highlighting the focal points within the light beam. White outlines are used sparingly to define shapes. The overall mood is cozy, indie, and creative, typical of modern editorial illustrations found in lifestyle magazines. No photorealism, heavy stippling effect, matte finish.
description_en: A cozy, textured digital illustration style mimicking chalk pastels and risograph printing with a grainy, hand-drawn feel. It features a distinct, hard-edged cone of light that creates a dramatic contrast between the bright, washed-out center and the darker, shadowed surroundings.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration numérique texturé et chaleureux imitant les pastels à la craie et l'impression risographique avec un aspect granuleux fait main. Il se distingue par un cône de lumière net et dramatique qui crée un fort contraste entre le centre lumineux et les zones environnantes plus sombres.
background_prompt: A textured, flat surface view serving as a background environment, rendered in a grainy chalk-pastel style. The scene is bathed in a deep {{primary_color}} tone, interrupted by a sharp, triangular beam of bright light cutting across the composition. Within the light beam, the surface texture appears washed out and brighter, while outside the beam, the {{primary_color}} is darker and more saturated. Subtle, abstract shapes and {{accent_color}} decorative elements are scattered loosely in the periphery, maintaining a rough, hand-drawn stippled aesthetic without any central subject.
prompt_removebg: A highly detailed, textured editorial illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a flat yet dimensional style reminiscent of modern tech blog art or risograph printing. The rendering mimics the texture of chalk or pastel on rough grain paper, featuring heavy noise, stippled shading, and imperfect, organic edges. The composition is defined by a dramatic, stylized lighting setup: a sharp, geometric cone of light cuts across the scene, illuminating the {{subject}} in bright, warm tones while casting the surrounding areas into deep, textured shadow. The color palette utilizes {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the main forms, contrasted with {{accent_color}} for highlights and key details within the lit areas. The shading is not smooth but composed of speckled grain and noise gradients. The artwork is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, ensuring distinct separation between the textured illustration and the background canvas. The overall mood is productive, cozy, and tactile, blending digital precision with analog warmth. Reinforcement tags: editorial illustration, risograph style, grainy texture, noise overlay, flat design, hard lighting, sharp shadows, chalk texture, lo-fi aesthetic, vector art with texture, stippling, high contrast, geometric light, cozy atmosphere, detailed textures.
background_prompt_removebg: A textured, atmospheric background scene featuring a dramatic lighting effect without a central subject. A sharp, geometric cone of light cuts through the environment, creating a distinct boundary between the illuminated zone and the shadowed surroundings. The surface texture resembles rough paper or felt with heavy grain and noise. The scene is colored in shades of {{primary_color}} with subtle hints of {{accent_color}} in the textured noise, all set against a {{background_color}} base. The composition serves as a grainy, lo-fi stage or frame.

title: Spotlight Schematic
description: Un style d'illustration technique distinctif mettant en vedette des dessins précis à l'encre fine sur du papier beige texturé. L'élément déterminant est un cône de lumière géométrique qui colore sélectivement le point focal, contrastant avec les contours monochromes de l'environnement environnant.
prompt: A highly detailed technical line art illustration of {{subject}} presented as a precise architectural sketch or isometric diagram. The artwork is rendered using fine, consistent ink lines in {{primary_color}} on a heavy, textured beige paper background. A dramatic, semi-transparent geometric cone of light in {{accent_color}} shines down from above, creating a 'spotlight effect' that illuminates the central subject. Inside the beam of light, the forms are slightly filled with warm, flat tones of {{accent_color}}, while everything outside the cone remains as hollow, skeletal outlines in {{primary_color}}. The paper texture is prominent, featuring visible grain, fibers, imperfections, and speckles resembling recycled cardstock or vintage vellum. The composition utilizes negative space and clean geometry to create a mood of focused isolation and schematic clarity. The rendering style balances mechanical precision with hand-drawn warmth, utilizing flat perspective and sharp vector-like strokes. Reinforcement tags: isometric view, technical drawing, blueprint aesthetic, grainy paper texture, selective coloring, volumetric lighting, hard edges, minimal shading, schematic, drafting style, clean lines, high contrast, 2D flat illustration.
background_prompt: A textured beige paper background featuring faint, schematic architectural lines and grid fragments drawn in {{primary_color}} ink. A distinct, semi-transparent beam of {{accent_color}} light cuts through the empty space from top to bottom, creating a highlighted zone against the rough, fibrous paper grain. No main subject, only the atmospheric workspace environment and drafting aesthetics.
description_en: A distinctive technical illustration style featuring precise fine-line ink drawings on textured beige paper. The defining element is a geometric cone of light that selectively colors the focal point, contrasting with the monochromatic outlines of the surrounding environment.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration technique distinctif mettant en vedette des dessins précis à l'encre fine sur du papier beige texturé. L'élément déterminant est un cône de lumière géométrique qui colore sélectivement le point focal, contrastant avec les contours monochromes de l'environnement environnant.
prompt_removebg: A sophisticated isometric line art illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a technical drafting style, set against a highly textured {{background_color}} paper background. The artwork uses fine, consistent ink lines in {{primary_color}} to define the shapes with precision and clarity, mimicking the look of a architectural sketch or engineering diagram. The defining visual feature is a dramatic, hard-edged cone of light projecting from above in {{accent_color}}. This beam of light creates a 'spotlight effect': everything within the geometric light cone is washed in a flat, translucent {{accent_color}} fill, highlighting the {{subject}}, while everything outside the beam remains as transparent, negative-space outlines showing the {{background_color}} texture underneath. The composition relies on the interplay between the detailed {{primary_color}} wireframe lines and the bold block of {{accent_color}} light. There is no shading or gradient shading, only the flat interaction of line, paper texture, and the projected light shape. Visible paper grain, speckles, and slight imperfections add a tactile, vintage stationery feel. The aesthetic is clean, organized, yet artistically hand-drawn. Reinforcement tags: isometric perspective, fine liner, technical illustration, blueprint aesthetic, high contrast, clean lines, vector style, paper texture overlay, minimalist, geometric lighting, 2D flat design, crisp details.
background_prompt_removebg: A wide shot of a textured {{background_color}} paper surface featuring scattered environmental details and debris sketched in fine {{primary_color}} outlines. Faint architectural grid lines or perspective guides fade into the background. A dramatic, geometric beam of {{accent_color}} light cuts through the empty space, illuminating a patch of the floor or surface, creating a focal point without a main subject. The texture of the paper is prominent with visible grain and fibers.

title: Vintage Stamp
description: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
description_en: This style replicates the aesthetic of mid-century rubber stamps, linocuts, or matchbox art, characterized by a limited duotone palette and uneven, textured ink application. It features bold graphic shapes, negative space detailing, and a coarse, grainy finish on warm, aged paper.
description_fr: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique des tampons en caoutchouc, des linogravures ou des illustrations de boîtes d'allumettes du milieu du siècle, caractérisée par une palette duotone limitée et une application d'encre inégale et texturée. Il présente des formes graphiques audacieuses, des détails en espace négatif et une finition granuleuse sur un papier chaud et vieilli.
prompt: A vintage linocut and rubber stamp style illustration of {{subject}}. The artwork mimics the distinct look of mid-century matchbox label art or folk block printing. The image utilizes a strict two-tone ink palette on a warm, off-white cream paper background. The {{subject}} is rendered primarily in heavy, textured {{primary_color}} ink, defining the main volume and silhouette. Secondary details, ground elements, or atmospheric accents are stamped in a contrasting {{accent_color}} ink. The rendering technique features visible stippling, 'salt and pepper' noise, and uneven ink distribution, simulating the imperfections of a physical hand-pressed stamp. Details are carved out using negative space (the cream paper color) rather than drawn lines. There are no smooth gradients; shading is achieved through hatching or grain density. The edges of the forms are slightly eroded and rough. The overall atmosphere is rustic, nostalgic, and handcrafted, with a tactile paper texture visible throughout the composition. Reinforcement tags: woodblock print, risograph, screen print, coarse grain, ink bleed, eroded edges, flat colors, high contrast, folk art, 1950s design, analog texture, tactile finish, matte, retro aesthetic, minimalist composition.
background_prompt: A decorative background texture and environment in the style of a vintage block print or rubber stamp. The scene consists of rustic patterns, foliage, or abstract landscape elements rendered in rough {{accent_color}} ink on a warm cream paper texture. Patches of weathered {{primary_color}} ink stippling provide depth and contrast. The texture features heavy grain, ink erosion, and uneven stamping pressure, creating a nostalgic and handcrafted border or backdrop without a central figure.
prompt_removebg: A highly detailed vintage illustration of {{subject}} executed in the style of a classic woodblock print, copperplate engraving, or Toile de Jouy pattern. The artwork utilizes a strict duotone color scheme, with the {{subject}} rendered primarily in deep {{primary_color}} ink, while supporting environmental details, ground textures, or secondary elements are depicted in {{accent_color}}. The artistic technique relies heavily on stippling, dot work, and fine cross-hatching to define volume and texture, completely avoiding smooth gradients or modern digital shading. The lines are slightly rough, organic, and grainy, mimicking the imperfections of traditional analog ink printing on coarse paper. The visual atmosphere is nostalgic, rustic, and elegant, reminiscent of 19th-century storybook illustrations or antique lithographs. The image is composited centrally on a flat, clean {{background_color}} background to maximize contrast and ensure easy separation. The edges of the ink work show slight bleed and distressed texture. Key visual characteristics include etched lines, rough paper grain, and a screen-print aesthetic. Reinforcement tags: copperplate engraving, retro print, stipple art, high contrast, monochromatic variation, ink texture, historical illustration, vector-ready, clean composition, artistic sketching, rough paper grain, detailed line work, no blur, sharp ink edges.
background_prompt_removebg: A decorative vintage landscape or pattern featuring pastoral elements, stylized etched foliage, and rough terrain textures rendered in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The design mimics the hatched and stippled look of antique engravings or Toile de Jouy fabrics. The scene is set against a {{background_color}} surface, providing a textured, nostalgic atmosphere with visible paper grain and ink imperfections, devoid of any central character.

title: Playful Render
description: Un style d'animation 3D haute qualité rappelant les films Pixar, avec des proportions stylisées, une diffusion subsurface douce sur la peau et des textures de tissu tactiles. L'esthétique mêle éclairage réaliste et design de personnages charmants et arrondis.
description_en: A high-quality 3D animation style resembling modern feature films like Pixar, featuring stylized proportions, soft subsurface scattering on skin, and tactile fabric textures. The look combines realistic lighting with charming, rounded character designs.
description_fr: Un style d'animation 3D haute qualité rappelant les films Pixar, avec des proportions stylisées, une diffusion subsurface douce sur la peau et des textures de tissu tactiles. L'esthétique mêle éclairage réaliste et design de personnages charmants et arrondis.
prompt: A high-end 3D CGI animated character render of {{subject}}, executed in the distinct visual style of a modern feature film by studios like Pixar, Disney, or Illumination. The character design features appealing, stylized proportions with smooth, rounded geometry and expressive features. The rendering technique is physically based (PBR) with a focus on tactile realism: the skin exhibits soft subsurface scattering (SSS) creating a warm, living glow, while clothing and surfaces display intricate micro-textures like fuzzy fleece, woven cotton, or matte plastic in rich shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The lighting setup is a professional soft studio configuration, using a large diffuse key light to wrap around the form, a subtle rim light to separate the subject from the background, and global illumination to fill shadows with warmth. The atmosphere is cheerful, clean, and vibrant. Reinforcement tags: Octane Render, Cinema 4D, Blender Cycles, 8k resolution, raytracing, ambient occlusion, photorealistic materials, cute, expressive, volumetric lighting, sharp focus, shallow depth of field, bokeh, masterfully modeled.
background_prompt: A clean, soft-focus studio gradient background transitioning smoothly between {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The environment is minimal and abstract, simulating a high-end photography backdrop with a shallow depth of field. It features creamy bokeh blur, gentle light falloff, and a smooth, noise-free texture that provides a neutral yet vibrant setting.
prompt_removebg: A premium, high-fidelity 3D character render of {{subject}} designed in a stylized, modern animation aesthetic similar to Pixar or Illumination studios. The rendering is defined by soft, tactile surfaces; the {{subject}} features a mix of smooth, matte skin textures with strong subsurface scattering (SSS) to create a warm, fleshy translucency, and clothing or outer layers made of high-quality plush fabrics or soft matte polymers. The color palette is dominated by a vibrant yet pleasing {{primary_color}}, with thoughtful details and trim in {{accent_color}}. The lighting setup is a sophisticated softbox studio arrangement: large, diffuse light sources wrap gently around the form, creating smooth gradients and eliminating harsh shadows, while a subtle rim light separates the subject from the surroundings. The image is composited against a clean, seamless {{background_color}} background to ensure perfect edge definition and contrast for isolation. The overall look is round, friendly, and physically plausible, with physically based rendering (PBR) materials that look touchable, soft, and velvety. The camera uses a portrait lens with a very slight depth of field to focus attention on the eyes and face of the {{subject}}.
background_prompt_removebg: A soft, abstract 3D environment featuring smooth, curved geometry and gentle gradients. The scene is composed of blurred shapes and bokeh effects in shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, creating a dreamy, out-of-focus studio atmosphere. The lighting is ambient and diffuse, casting no hard shadows, set against a base tone of {{background_color}}.

title: Bauhaus Geometry
description: Ce style présente une abstraction géométrique minimaliste inspirée du mouvement Bauhaus et du constructivisme, utilisant des formes primitives pour déconstruire les sujets. Il repose sur des blocs plats et solides de couleurs vives et des bords nets sur un fond crème texturé, totalement dépourvu de dégradés ou d'ombres.
description_en: This style features a minimalist, geometric abstraction inspired by the Bauhaus movement and Constructivism, utilizing primitive shapes to deconstruct subjects. It relies on flat, solid blocks of bold color and sharp edges on a textured cream background, completely devoid of gradients or shading.
description_fr: Ce style présente une abstraction géométrique minimaliste inspirée du mouvement Bauhaus et du constructivisme, utilisant des formes primitives pour déconstruire les sujets. Il repose sur des blocs plats et solides de couleurs vives et des bords nets sur un fond crème texturé, totalement dépourvu de dégradés ou d'ombres.
prompt: A highly stylized, minimalist geometric abstraction of {{subject}}, rendered in the distinct visual language of the Bauhaus movement and Russian Constructivism. The subject is deconstructed and reassembled using only fundamental geometric primitives—perfect circles, sharp triangles, squares, and rigid rectangles. The artistic technique mimics a high-end vector illustration or a clean screen print collage. The composition is strictly 2D flat design; there is absolutely no shading, no gradients, no drop shadows, and no depth of field. The forms are defined by razor-sharp hard edges and solid color fills. The color palette is bold and graphic, utilizing large blocks of {{primary_color}} as the dominant force, balanced by striking geometric accents of {{accent_color}}, anchored by heavy solid black structural elements and pure white negative space. The layout follows Swiss Design principles with asymmetrical balance and grid-like precision. The entire composition is set against a warm, subtle off-white or cream-colored matte paper texture to provide a vintage print feel. The mood is intellectual, modern, and structurally disciplined, focusing on shape interaction and color theory rather than realistic detail. minimalist, vector art, graphic design, Paul Rand style, Piet Mondrian influence, sharp focus, 4k, ultra-clean, architectural, abstract modernism, hard-edge painting.
background_prompt: A minimalist abstract background composition inspired by Constructivism, featuring a warm cream-colored paper texture. The scene is populated by sparse, floating geometric primitives—isolated triangles, lines, and circles—rendered in flat {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. These elements act as a framing device or a subtle backdrop, arranged asymmetrically with hard edges and no gradients. The style is strictly 2D flat design, creating a clean, architectural atmosphere without any central subject.
prompt_removebg: A striking geometric abstraction of {{subject}}, rendered in a classic Bauhaus and Constructivist graphic design style. The subject is deconstructed into fundamental geometric primitives: sharp triangles, perfect circles, semi-circles, and bold rectangles that assemble to suggest the form without realistic detail. The artwork utilizes a strict flat vector aesthetic with absolutely no gradients, no shading, no drop shadows, and no 3D depth. The color palette is high-contrast, featuring large solid blocks of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} balanced by heavy black structural elements and negative space. The edges are razor-sharp and mathematically precise. The finish mimics a high-quality vintage screen print or lithograph, possessing a subtle matte graininess and slight ink-bleed texture on a porous surface. The composition relies on asymmetry and dynamic balance typical of 1920s avant-garde posters. The entire illustration is isolated against a uniform {{background_color}} background, which serves as the paper or canvas substrate, ensuring distinct separation of the geometric forms. title: Woolen Texture
description: Ce style imite l'art du feutrage à l'aiguille fait main, caractérisé par des textures douces et duveteuses et une esthétique de macrophotographie miniature. Il présente des palettes de couleurs pastel, une faible profondeur de champ et une atmosphère tactile et réconfortante.
description_en: This style imitates handcrafted needle-felted wool art, characterized by soft, fuzzy textures and a miniature macro photography aesthetic. It features pastel color palettes, shallow depth of field, and a tactile, comforting atmosphere.
description_fr: Ce style imite l'art du feutrage à l'aiguille fait main, caractérisé par des textures douces et duveteuses et une esthétique de macrophotographie miniature. Il présente des palettes de couleurs pastel, une faible profondeur de champ et une atmosphère tactile et réconfortante.
prompt: A photorealistic macro close-up of a handcrafted needle-felted wool miniature depicting {{subject}}. The subject is constructed from soft, fibrous wool with visible fuzz and loose strands, rendered in a dominant {{primary_color}} palette with {{accent_color}} details. The texture is highly tactile, showcasing the chaotic yet soft weave of felted material. The lighting is bright, diffuse, and high-key, simulating a sunny studio environment with soft shadows and no harsh contrast. The composition utilizes an extremely shallow depth of field (bokeh), blurring the foreground and background to emphasize the miniature scale, similar to a tilt-shift lens effect. The overall aesthetic is cute, whimsical, and reminiscent of stop-motion animation sets, evoking a sense of warmth and innocence. Reinforcement tags: needle felting, wool texture, macro photography, tilt-shift, fuzzy, tactile, soft lighting, pastel tones, stop motion aesthetic, craft art, 8k, highly detailed fibers, cute, photorealistic materials.
background_prompt: A blurry, out-of-focus backdrop of soft rolling hills and abstract organic shapes made of needle-felted wool. The scene uses {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} pastel tones to create a gentle, dreamy atmosphere. The texture is fuzzy and fibrous with visible wool strands, lit by bright, airy ambient light, evoking a miniature craft world.
prompt_removebg: A highly detailed, photorealistic macro photograph of a handcrafted needle-felted wool sculpture representing {{subject}}. The object is constructed entirely from compressed, fuzzy wool roving, showcasing a rich, tactile surface texture with visible stray fibers, interlocking strands, and a soft, matte finish. The {{subject}} is rendered in a cute, rounded, semi-chibi aesthetic with simplified but expressive features, primarily colored in shades of {{primary_color}} with delicate details and accessories in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is soft, diffused, and high-key, mimicking professional studio toy photography or a bright stop-motion animation set, which creates a gentle rim light that accentuates the fuzziness of the silhouette against the backdrop. The camera angle is slightly low, enhancing the sense of scale in this miniature world. The image features an incredibly shallow depth of field (f/1.8), keeping the eyes and front of the {{subject}} in razor-sharp focus while the rest fades into a creamy, dreamy blur. The scene is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, providing a smooth, solid backdrop that contrasts with the rough texture of the wool and allows for easy background removal while preserving the delicate fiber edges. The overall mood is cozy, innocent, whimsical, and deeply texture-rich, evoking the warmth of handmade crafts. reinforcement tags: needle felting, wool texture, macro lens, tilt-shift, bokeh, soft lighting, cute, tactile, volumetric lighting, 8k, ultra-detailed, photorealistic materials, stop motion style, fibrous, craft art.
background_prompt_removebg: A soft-focus, blurry background scene depicting a miniature landscape made of needle-felted wool. The environment consists of abstract rolling hills and soft, rounded shapes in fuzzy textures of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. In the distance, out-of-focus wool spheres or pompoms float like balloons or abstract clouds. The entire scene is set against a {{background_color}} sky or backdrop, maintaining a bright, airy, and pastel atmosphere. The depth of field is extremely shallow, rendering the background elements as colorful, textured bokeh blobs that suggest a whimsical, handcrafted world without distracting detail.

title: Pastel Minimalism
description: Ce style présente une esthétique vectorielle épurée et plate, caractérisée par des tons pastel doux et des formes lisses sans contours. Il utilise des ombres géométriques distinctes et un éclairage directionnel chaleureux pour créer une atmosphère cosy, moderne et minimaliste, souvent observée dans les illustrations d'entreprise haut de gamme.
description_en: This style features a clean, flat vector aesthetic characterized by soft pastel tones and smooth, lineless shapes. It utilizes distinct geometric shadows and warm directional lighting to create a cozy, modern, and minimalist atmosphere commonly seen in high-end corporate illustration.
description_fr: Ce style présente une esthétique vectorielle épurée et plate, caractérisée par des tons pastel doux et des formes lisses sans contours. Il utilise des ombres géométriques distinctes et un éclairage directionnel chaleureux pour créer une atmosphère cosy, moderne et minimaliste, souvent observée dans les illustrations d'entreprise haut de gamme.
prompt: A sophisticated flat vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a clean, modern minimalist style. The artwork relies on smooth, lineless shapes with precise edges, mimicking high-end digital vector art or corporate Memphis design. There are no black outlines; forms are defined entirely by color blocking and subtle contrast. The color palette is soft, muted, and matte, dominated by soothing shades of {{primary_color}} with tasteful details and highlights in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is a critical stylistic element: simulate soft, warm directional sunlight (resembling morning window light) that casts distinct, diagonal geometric shadows across the subject and background, adding depth to the 2D plane. The texture is perfectly smooth and matte, similar to a high-quality digital print or vector graphic. The composition is balanced and airy, emphasizing negative space and geometric simplicity. The overall mood is calm, productive, and serene. Reinforcement tags: flat design, vector art, Adobe Illustrator style, Behance, Dribbble, lineless art, pastel tones, soft shadows, geometric lighting, 2D, high resolution, sharp edges, minimalist, lo-fi aesthetic, matte finish, peaceful atmosphere.
background_prompt: A minimalist architectural or geometric environment rendered in a clean flat vector style. The scene features smooth walls and surfaces in soft {{primary_color}} tones, accented by simple structural elements or furniture shapes in {{accent_color}}. Diagonal beams of warm light cut across the scene, creating sharp yet soft-edged geometric shadows that provide depth to the flat design. No characters or subjects, just a serene, organized, and modern background setting with a matte finish.
prompt_removebg: A sophisticated, high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, designed in a clean, modern, and minimalist art style similar to high-end corporate lifestyle graphics. The rendering is completely lineless, relying on precise geometric shapes and varying tonal values to define form and volume. The surface texture is smooth, matte, and digital, with absolutely no noise, grain, or brushstrokes. The color palette is soft, muted, and harmonious, dominated by shades of {{primary_color}} with tasteful touches of {{accent_color}} to guide the eye. The lighting is a crucial stylistic element: simulate a bright, natural light source (like morning sun through a window) coming from the side, casting sharp-edged, semi-transparent diagonal shadows across the {{subject}}. These shadows should be slightly darker tones of the base colors, not black. The composition is balanced and calm, evoking a sense of tranquility and order. The image is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface, ensuring distinct separation between the subject edges and the background for easy removal. The overall aesthetic is cozy, polished, and professional.
background_prompt_removebg: A minimalist architectural or interior backdrop rendered in a flat vector style. The scene consists of clean geometric planes and simple structural elements like walls or shelves in shades of {{background_color}}. Soft, diagonal shafts of light cut across the scene, creating sharp, angular shadows in muted {{primary_color}} tones. Subtle decorative elements or organic shapes in {{accent_color}} provide balance without clutter. No central subject, lineless art, smooth matte finish, serene atmosphere.

title: Riso Collage
description: Ce style combine des formes géométriques plates et audacieuses avec l'esthétique granuleuse et texturée de l'impression risographique et de l'illustration au pinceau sec. Il présente des blocs de couleurs très contrastés, des bords rugueux et déchiquetés, ainsi qu'un mélange de noirs profonds et de tons primaires vibrants pour créer un look contemporain et abstrait.
description_en: This style combines bold, flat geometric shapes with the grainy, textured aesthetic of risograph printing and dry-brush illustration. It features high-contrast color blocking, rough jagged edges, and a mix of solid blacks with vibrant primary tones to create a contemporary, abstract look.
description_fr: Ce style combine des formes géométriques plates et audacieuses avec l'esthétique granuleuse et texturée de l'impression risographique et de l'illustration au pinceau sec. Il présente des blocs de couleurs très contrastés, des bords rugueux et déchiquetés, ainsi qu'un mélange de noirs profonds et de tons primaires vibrants pour créer un look contemporain et abstrait.
prompt: A striking, highly stylized artistic illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a bold, mixed-media aesthetic reminiscent of textured gouache and acrylic markers. The artwork utilizes a distinct 'color blocking' technique where forms are defined by flat, jagged shapes rather than smooth gradients. The palette is dominated by distinct areas of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, creating a high-contrast visual impact set against a clean {{background_color}} background. The texture is crucial: visible dry-brush strokes, rough edges, and stippled noise patterns (particularly in textured areas like hair or fabric) give the image a tactile, hand-crafted feel. Black ink-like lines are thick, uneven, and expressive, occasionally breaking into wavy, zigzag, or scribbled patterns to define shadows and contours. The composition embraces negative space, allowing the {{background_color}} canvas to interact with the subject, sometimes cutting into the form to create highlights. Lighting is implied through sharp color changes rather than soft shadows, creating a posterized, graphic novel effect. The rendering style avoids photorealism entirely, favoring a flat, dimensional collage look with a grainy, matte finish. High contrast, sharp focus, artistic abstraction, screen print aesthetic, visible bristle marks, editorial illustration style, modern art, expressive strokes.

The aesthetic mimics a torn paper collage or a painted surface with peeling layers, emphasizing tactile grunge, broad strokes, and artistic imperfection without any central subject, creating a decorative frame of raw artistic expression.

title: Ghibli Pastoral
description: Ce style imite l'esthétique légendaire de l'animation traditionnelle 2D à gros budget, en particulier les arrière-plans luxuriants peints à la main et les personnages aux ombrages nets typiques des films du Studio Ghibli. Il présente une atmosphère nostalgique et sereine avec une lumière tachetée, des textures naturelles riches et un mélange harmonieux de décors style gouache avec un trait de crayon propre.
description_en: This style emulates the legendary aesthetic of high-budget traditional 2D animation, specifically the lush, hand-painted backgrounds and crisp cel-shaded characters typical of Studio Ghibli films. It features a nostalgic, serene atmosphere with dappled sunlight, rich natural textures, and a harmonious blend of gouache-style scenery with clean line art.
description_fr: Ce style imite l'esthétique légendaire de l'animation traditionnelle 2D à gros budget, en particulier les arrière-plans luxuriants peints à la main et les personnages aux ombrages nets typiques des films du Studio Ghibli. Il présente une atmosphère nostalgique et sereine avec une lumière tachetée, des textures naturelles riches et un mélange harmonieux de décors style gouache avec un trait de crayon propre.
prompt:
A breathtaking, high-fidelity frame from a traditional 2D animated feature film, capturing the masterfully crafted aesthetic of Hayao Miyazaki and Studio Ghibli. The central focus is {{subject}}, rendered with crisp, delicate dark outlines and smooth, flat cel-shading (anime style coloring) that contrasts beautifully with the environment. The color palette is dominated by natural, earthy tones with {{primary_color}} as the main thematic hue and {{accent_color}} providing vibrant highlights on the subject's details. 

The background is a work of art in itself, mimicking the texture of hand-painted poster colors and opaque watercolors (gouache) on textured paper. It features incredible density and detail in foliage or architecture, with soft, impressionistic brushstrokes that suggest moss, leaves, and weathered stone. The lighting is evocative and atmospheric, specifically capturing 'komorebi'—dappled sunlight filtering through trees or windows—casting soft, dappled shadows across the scene. The mood is {{mood}}, evoking a sense of nostalgic wonder, summer memories, and serene stillness. The composition uses a slight wide-angle lens effect to place the subject within a grand, immersive environment, maintaining a sharp focus on the character while the background retains a painterly softness.

reinforcement tags: Studio Ghibli style, Spirited Away aesthetic, 1990s anime, hand-drawn animation, masterpiece, 8k resolution, lush vegetation, scenic, pastoral, serene, atmospheric lighting, Tyndall effect, high quality, precise line art, matte painting background, visual storytelling.
background_prompt: A lush, hand-painted background scene in the style of a Studio Ghibli movie, featuring no characters. The scene depicts a dense, atmospheric environment (such as a forest tunnel, an old shrine, or a rural path) painted with opaque watercolors and gouache. The texture is rich and organic, showing mossy surfaces, ancient stones, and dense foliage in shades of {{primary_color}} and deep greens. Dappled sunlight filters through the canopy, creating patches of bright light and cool shadow. Hints of {{accent_color}} appear in small flowers or architectural details. The perspective is immersive, drawing the viewer into a serene, nostalgic world.
prompt_removebg: A high-fidelity reproduction of a classic Studio Ghibli animation frame featuring {{subject}}. The artistic rendering technique is traditional hand-drawn 2D animation, combining crisp cel-shaded character art with a rich, painterly background reminiscent of Kazuo Oga's work. The {{subject}} is defined by thin, consistent ink outlines, smooth matte colors, and distinct hard-edged shadows (cel shading) to create volume without excessive gradient. The color palette utilizes natural, slightly desaturated tones dominated by {{primary_color}}, with specific details highlighted in {{accent_color}}. The lighting mimics 'komorebi' (sunlight filtering through trees), casting dappled, soft light and gentle shadows across the form. The texture of the subject is smooth and clean, contrasting with the grainy, textured look of the painted environment. The atmosphere is peaceful, nostalgic, and immersive, typical of a Hayao Miyazaki film. The image is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface to ensure sharp edge definition and easy separation from the canvas. The overall composition emphasizes a 'slice of life' moment in a fantasy setting, with a shallow depth of field effect blurring the distant elements slightly.
background_prompt_removebg: A meticulously hand-painted anime background scene in the style of traditional gouache and poster color art. The setting is a lush, overgrown environment featuring ancient stone textures, dense foliage, and mossy surfaces in shades of {{primary_color}}. Soft, dappled sunlight filters through the canopy, creating patches of brightness and deep shadow. Small {{accent_color}} wildflowers or magical artifacts are scattered subtly in the grass. The painting shows visible brushstrokes and a watercolor paper texture, fading into a soft atmospheric blur in the distance, all set against a neutral {{background_color}} base layer.

title: Carved Linocut
description: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique audacieuse et très contrastée de la linogravure traditionnelle ou de la gravure sur bois, caractérisée par des silhouettes lourdement encrées et des détails en espace négatif. Il présente des bords organiques légèrement rugueux et une palette de couleurs bicolore et plate qui imite l'aspect d'une impression en relief tamponnée ou sculptée à la main.
description_en: This style replicates the bold, high-contrast aesthetic of traditional linocut or woodblock printing, characterized by heavy inked silhouettes and negative space details. It features organic, slightly rough edges and a flat, two-tone color scheme that mimics the look of a hand-stamped or carved relief print.
description_fr: Ce style reproduit l'esthétique audacieuse et très contrastée de la linogravure traditionnelle ou de la gravure sur bois, caractérisée par des silhouettes lourdement encrées et des détails en espace négatif. Il présente des bords organiques légèrement rugueux et une palette de couleurs bicolore et plate qui imite l'aspect d'une impression en relief tamponnée ou sculptée à la main.
prompt: A striking, high-contrast linocut print illustration of {{subject}}. The artwork must mimic the authentic aesthetic of a hand-carved woodblock, rubber stamp, or lino print. The subject is rendered as a bold, solid silhouette in deep {{primary_color}} ink, possessing a heavy visual weight and distinct, chunky geometry. Internal details, textures, and facial features are defined exclusively by 'carved out' negative space, revealing the flat {{accent_color}} background underneath, creating a stark two-tone effect. The lines should be thick, organic, and fluid, drawing inspiration from tribal art, Polynesian motifs, and primitive folk aesthetics. The edges of the forms should appear slightly imperfect and rough, simulating the physical pressure of ink on paper and the manual carving process. There are absolutely no gradients, shading, or 3D rendering; the image is entirely flat, graphic, and vector-like. The composition focuses on strong shapes and solid masses rather than intricate fine lines. The overall mood is rustic, handcrafted, and iconic, capturing the essence of relief printing techniques. The texture of the 'ink' should look solid but with microscopic jaggedness at the boundaries to enhance the stamped feel. --no shading, gradients, photorealism, 3D, blur, bokeh, perspective --v 6.0 --style raw
prompt_removebg: A striking, high-contrast linocut block print illustration of a {{subject}}. The artistic style mimics traditional Polynesian or tribal petroglyphs modernized into a bold graphic stamp. The subject is rendered in solid, heavy masses of {{primary_color}} ink, possessing a visual weight that suggests a hand-pressed relief print. Internal details and textures are created exclusively through negative space 'gouges' and scratch marks that reveal the underlying surface color, using {{accent_color}} for subtle carved highlights. The edges of the forms are slightly rough and organic, simulating the imperfections of a hand-carved lino sheet or woodblock. There is absolutely no shading, gradients, or 3D depth; the image is a purely flat, two-tone graphic composition. The lines are thick, curvilinear, and stylized, emphasizing silhouette over realistic proportion. The artwork is set against a clean, flat {{background_color}} background, ensuring a stark separation between the inked subject and the surface. The overall aesthetic is rustic, artisanal, and iconic, capturing the essence of folk art and primitive symbolism.
background_prompt: A flat, textured surface resembling matte construction paper, heavy cardstock, or fabric in a solid {{accent_color}} hue. The background acts as a blank canvas for a relief print, potentially featuring subtle, repetitive tribal patterns or woodgrain textures that are barely visible, rendered in a slightly lighter or darker shade of {{accent_color}} to maintain a monochromatic and minimalist look. The texture should suggest a fibrous material capable of absorbing {{primary_color}} ink, with no depth of field or lighting effects, remaining completely 2D and graphic.
background_prompt_removebg: A textured background surface featuring repetitive tribal geometric patterns, stylized wave motifs, and rough-hewn borders carved in a linocut style. The design uses bold {{primary_color}} block shapes and {{accent_color}} gouge marks against a {{background_color}} surface, creating a decorative frame or wallpaper effect that mimics a hand-stamped fabric or woodblock print texture without any central subject.

title: Velvet Noir
description: Ce style capture l'essence dramatique de la photographie de film noir classique, caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté et une atmosphère sombre et mystérieuse. Il présente un fort contre-jour, une brume volumétrique et une texture de grain de film distincte qui crée une profondeur cinématographique douce.
description_en: This style captures the dramatic essence of classic film noir photography, characterized by high-contrast chiaroscuro lighting and a moody, mysterious atmosphere. It features strong rim lighting, volumetric haze, and a distinct film grain texture that creates a soft, cinematic depth.
description_fr: Ce style capture l'essence dramatique de la photographie de film noir classique, caractérisée par un éclairage en clair-obscur très contrasté et une atmosphère sombre et mystérieuse. Il présente un fort contre-jour, une brume volumétrique et une texture de grain de film distincte qui crée une profondeur cinématographique douce.
prompt: A stunning, cinematic film noir style photograph of {{subject}} captured with a vintage 35mm camera. The scene is defined by dramatic, high-contrast chiaroscuro lighting, where deep shadows conceal details and intense rim lighting (backlighting) creates a glowing halo effect around the silhouette of the {{subject}}. The atmosphere is thick with volumetric fog and cigarette smoke haze, diffusing the light sources into soft, large, creamy bokeh orbs in the background. The visual texture mimics analog film stock with visible grain, high ISO noise, and a slight diffusion filter effect (Pro-Mist) that softens skin tones while keeping the eyes in sharp focus. The color grading is moody and atmospheric, washing the scene in deep, desaturated tones of {{primary_color}}, while subtle glimmers of {{accent_color}} catch the highlights and rim light, adding a touch of elegance to the darkness. The composition utilizes a very shallow depth of field (f/1.2), blurring foreground elements and background figures into abstract shapes. The overall mood is mysterious, intimate, and melancholic, reminiscent of 1940s cinema but with modern rendering clarity. no perspective, sharp focus on eyes, cinematic lighting, 8k, ultra detailed, volumetric light, soft shadows, photorealistic, masterpiece, ray tracing, anamorphic lens flares, film grain, emotional atmosphere.
prompt_removebg: A stunning, cinematic film noir style photograph of {{subject}}, capturing the essence of classic 1940s Hollywood mystery. The visual aesthetic is defined by extreme chiaroscuro lighting, where deep, impenetrable shadows contrast with brilliant, glowing highlights. The subject is illuminated by a dramatic rim light (backlight) that creates a halo effect, tinted in subtle {{accent_color}} hues, while soft, diffused fill light reveals the intricate textures of the subject. The overall color palette is heavily desaturated and moody, dominated by {{primary_color}} tones and monochromatic shades, simulating the look of vintage Kodak Tri-X 400 film stock. The texture is gritty and raw, featuring visible heavy film grain, ISO noise, and halation around bright light sources. A soft, dreamlike diffusion filter effect softens the skin while keeping the eyes sharp. The atmosphere is thick with volumetric haze, swirling smoke, or mist, adding depth and palpable tension to the air. The image is set against a {{background_color}} background, which serves as the dark ambient void or surface from which the subject emerges. The depth of field is extremely shallow (f/1.4 aperture), creating creamy bokeh that blurs out foreground and background elements to completely isolate the {{subject}}. Composition is elegant and emotive, evoking feelings of melancholy and intrigue. cinematic lighting, photorealistic, 35mm film, grainy texture, emotional, mysterious, masterpiece, 8k, highly detailed, sharp focus on eyes, volumetric lighting, ray tracing, shadowy, retro aesthetic.
background_prompt: A dark, atmospheric background scene immersed in heavy volumetric fog and shadow. Large, out-of-focus circular bokeh lights glow softly in the distance, tinted in muted shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. Indistinct silhouettes of architectural elements or furniture fade into the deep black void. The texture is grainy and cinematic, with dust particles floating in shafts of backlighting, creating a mysterious and moody environment perfect for a noir setting.
background_prompt_removebg: A blurred, atmospheric background scene evoking a dimly lit vintage interior, jazz club, or rainy street at night. The environment is shrouded in deep shadows and volumetric smoke. Out-of-focus bokeh lights in shades of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} float in the darkness, creating a sense of depth and mystery. The setting features vague, indistinct silhouettes of architectural details, glassware, or street lamps hidden in the gloom. The overall tone is moody and cinematic, set against a base canvas of {{background_color}}, with heavy film grain, noise, and a vintage noir texture suitable for framing a foreground subject.

title: Tech Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne caractérisé par des contours noirs nets et des aplats de couleur unie. Il présente des formes simplifiées et des éléments d'interface abstraits flottants, typiques de l'image de marque des entreprises technologiques.
description_en: A modern flat vector illustration style characterized by clean black outlines and solid color fills. It features simplified forms and floating abstract UI elements typical of SaaS and corporate tech branding.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne caractérisé par des contours noirs nets et des aplats de couleur unie. Il présente des formes simplifiées et des éléments d'interface abstraits flottants, typiques de l'image de marque des entreprises technologiques.
prompt: A high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}} rendered in a modern corporate tech aesthetic. The artwork features crisp, uniform thin black outlines defining every shape, filled with flat, solid colors devoid of gradients or complex textures. The palette uses {{primary_color}} for the main clothing or object masses and {{accent_color}} for strategic highlights, focal points, or interactive elements, balanced by neutral cool greys and stark white. The composition includes stylized, floating decorative elements such as simplified UI panels, wireframe screens, and geometric primitives like small crosses, hollow circles, and squares surrounding the subject. Characters, if present, are depicted with stylized proportions, small heads, and faceless features to emphasize universality. The lighting is implied through simple, hard-edged drop shadows rather than realistic shading. The overall look is clean, organized, and digital, reminiscent of SaaS startup branding, Adobe Illustrator vector art, and trend-conscious Behance portfolios. Tags: 2D vector, svg style, flat design, corporate memphis, clean lines, minimalist, business illustration, tech concept, sharp edges, high contrast.
prompt_removebg: A professional flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a clean, modern line-art style synonymous with contemporary tech branding and SaaS visual identity. The artwork is defined by uniform, crisp black strokes (outlines) that enclose every shape, creating a sharp graphical look similar to Adobe Illustrator exports. The coloring is strictly flat with absolutely no gradients, shadows, textures, or 3D shading; it relies entirely on bold, solid color fills. Use {{primary_color}} as the dominant hue for the main clothing or structural elements, and apply {{accent_color}} for focal points, interactive objects, or energetic highlights. The {{subject}} is stylized with simplified features—such as faceless heads, smooth curves, and exaggerated, fluid limbs—conveying a sense of effortless productivity and motion. Surrounding the subject are decorative floating elements: simplified UI panels, blank browser windows, abstract documents, and small geometric primitives like floating crosses, circles, and dots. The entire composition is set against a solid {{background_color}} background, ensuring high contrast and hard edges for perfect isolation. The mood is optimistic, efficient, and digitally native, capturing the essence of modern workflow.
background_prompt: A minimalist white background populated by floating abstract geometric shapes and simplified tech elements. The scene includes hovering wireframe rectangles, blank UI panels, and small decorative icons like plus signs, dots, and circles. These elements are drawn with thin black outlines and feature subtle fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The arrangement is dynamic yet organized, creating a sense of digital workflow and modern connectivity without any central subject.
background_prompt_removebg: A decorative background composition of floating abstract technology elements and geometric shapes. The scene features simplified wireframe user interface panels, blank document rectangles, and small graphical primitives like crosses, circles, and dots drifting in a 2D space. The style uses clean black outlines and flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, arranged dynamically on a clean {{background_color}} surface to create a sense of digital flow and organization without any central subject.
